sentences.sContent: The new mathematics test will become the nemesis of teachers.
sentences.sCn: 新的数学测试将会是对老师们的严重惩罚。

synos.tran: 报应；给与惩罚的人；天罚

remMethod.val: 来自希腊神话中的复仇女神Nemesis

trans.tranCn: -ses(1)报应；公正的惩罚(2)[希神]报应女神
trans.tranOther: The nemesis of a person or thing is a situation, event, or person which causes them to be seriously harmed, especially as a punishment
